markdownRemark.html:
1. Power Up:

    • Apply 5V DC or 12V DC to the big power screw terminals

  2. Connection:

    • With a phone search for a device called wisdel-XXXX
    • Pair and trust the device.

  3. Interaction:

    • With a serial terminal send commands
    • GET will return the state of the device as a JSON string

  4. Change Name:

    • send NAME new_name to change the name of the device

  5. Test:

    1. Wire a light to the terminals for O1
    2. Send the logic string IF I1 = 1 THEN O1 = 1 ELSE O1 = 0
    3. Send MASTER so that the controller starts evaluating the stored logic
    4. Apply a 3 to 12V DC voltage to I1 and watch the light turn on.
  6. Wire up and program logic as desired
